game.name: SolveIt! A Puzzle Solving Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 터치 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: SolveIt! invites you into the world of twisty puzzles - from the timeless Rubik’s Cube to unique and challenging shapes. Whether you’re a casual solver or a speedcubing enthusiast, SolveIt lets you practice, compete, and learn - all in one place.
game.shortDescriptionEn: SolveIt! invites you into the world of twisty puzzles - from the timeless Rubik’s Cube to unique and challenging shapes. Whether you’re a casual solver or a speedcubing enthusiast, SolveIt lets you practice, compete, and learn - all in one place.
